data.name: Project Rayssus
data.detailed_description:
Project Rayssus | Synopsis
In the late 22nd century, humans expanded their living areas beyond the Earth to the moon and Mars.
Through a wormhole that suddenly collapsed in the asteroid belt between Jupiter and Mars,
Unidentified human-type combat Machine will come over and attack Colony, a resident of Mars, near it.

This tragedy, then called the Dimension Disaster, was based on the technology and data of the enemy that we acquired at that time will develop a human-type combat unit that can counter this it a code name is"Rayssus".
Rayssus is which means 'Colossus is use the Ray' conbine in create new word.

Through the Rayssus, mankind begins a counterattack against an enemy called the U.I.E.

Project Rayssus | Game Features

1. Customization System
Head / Chest / Arm / Leg / Backpack with Primary Weapon, Secondary Weapon, Proximity Weapon arm and Defense Weapon.
You can customize the Rayssus parts to suit the player's taste and operate your own Rayssus' gas.

2. Supporter Unit System
In the game, there is a supporter unit that supports the player.
Operator / A.I. Devices / Pilot Units can be hired and supported in accordance with the direction of play you are pursuing.

3. Mechanic-specific action, skill system
Players can play on the battlefield using the actions they can pursue in the genre of mechanical games and their skills.

data.short_description: Mechanic Action MMOTPS Project Rayssus Customize your own Rayssus and use your Weapons, actions, and skills to be active on the battlefield.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750TI 2GB / ATI Radeon™ HD 5970 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3500 CPU / AMD Ryzen 3 or Upper
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 TI 4GB or Upper / AMD Radeon™ RX 470 4GB or Upper
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
